    • setWebSocketClient

      private void setWebSocketClient(URI uri)
      Creates the websocket client and overrides the necessary methods including: onOpen and onMessage. Handles the proper cases and displays the correct data received from the websocket.
      Parameters:
      uri -

    • getUserAttributesFromOutfitId

      private void getUserAttributesFromOutfitId(long outfitId, LeaderboardItem item, LeaderboardActivity.UsernameCallback callback)
      Retrieves user attributes from the outfit ID and invokes the provided callback with the results. This method makes a request to get user information based on the outfit ID, processes the response, and calls the provided `UsernameCallback` methods depending on success or failure.
      Parameters:
      outfitId - The ID of the outfit for which user attributes are being retrieved.
      item - The leaderboard item associated with the user.
      callback - A callback to handle the result of the request, providing success, error, or completion notifications.

    • getUsername

      private void getUsername(long userId, LeaderboardItem item, LeaderboardActivity.UsernameCallback callback)
      Retrieves the username for a given user ID and invokes the provided callback with the result. This method makes a request to fetch user data by user ID, processes the response, and calls the provided `UsernameCallback` methods with success or error notifications.
      Parameters:
      userId - The user ID for which the username is being fetched.
      item - The leaderboard item associated with the user.
      callback - A callback to handle the result of the request, providing success, error, or completion notifications.

    • updateAdapter

      private void updateAdapter(ArrayList<LeaderboardItem> objects)
      Updates the adapter with a new list of leaderboard items. This method replaces the existing list of leaderboard items in the adapter and notifies the UI thread to refresh the display. If a `NullPointerException` occurs, it logs the error.
      Parameters:
      objects - The new list of leaderboard items to display in the UI.

    • setAdapter

      private void setAdapter()
      Sets the adapter for the RecyclerView. This method initializes the adapter with the current list of leaderboard items and attaches it to the RecyclerView. It also sets up an item click listener for the adapter.
